conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a murder movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM

I think I have just the movies for you! If you're in the mood for a clever and witty murder mystery, I highly recommend "Kiss Kiss Bang Bang". With Robert Downey Jr. and Val Kilmer starring, this movie is full of humor and clever plot twists that will keep you guessing until the very end.

If you're looking for something a bit more... unusual, I'd suggest checking out "House of 1000 Corpses". This cult classic has gained a reputation for its over-the-top violence and dark humor, so be prepared for a wild ride with Rob Zombie and his cast of quirky characters.
